select tu.user_code customerId, tu.user_acct customerAcct, tu.user_name customerName, tu.sex, tu.phone, tu.email, tu.id_card idCard from t_sys_user tu left join t_sys_customer tc on tu.user_code = tc.user_code where tu.is_deleted = 0 and tu.role = 4
and tu.user_acct like concat('%', #{customerAcct}, '%')
and tu.user_name like concat('%', #{customerName}, '%')
and tc.invite_code = #{inviteCode}
order by tu.create_time desc
select invite_code from t_sys_store where is_deleted = 0 and user_code = #{userId}
